summary: Seeking an HR Manager to lead talent acquisition, employee relations, and HR policy development for a fast-growing organization.
responsibilities: Oversee recruitment, onboarding, and retention initiatives.
Develop and implement HR policies and training programs.
Manage employee relations, conflict resolution, and performance reviews.
Ensure compliance with labor laws and company standards.
requirements_must_have: 5+ years of experience in HR or related field.
Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices.
Experience with HRIS and payroll systems.
